story.text: Jan 3 Home Properties Inc. (HME.N) said it bought the Mount Vernon Square apartment community in Alexandria, Virginia, on Dec. 27, for about $144.6 million, including debt. The consideration includes $53.9 million in cash from proceeds of the sale of the company's Upstate New York portfolio and assumption of about $90.7 million in fixed mortgage debt, the real estate investment trust said in a statement. (Reporting by Amitha Rajan in Bangalore)
story.title: home properties buys apartment community for $ 144 . 6 million
